score - Variable in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.Player
 
selected - Variable in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.DotCom
 
setCustomPlayerNames() - Method in class com.lxisoft.battle.game.app.GameEngine
Sets custom name for the players

The method calls Player.setName(String) method to set custom names for the players to replace the default names set by the GameEngine.GameEngine(int, int) constructor.
setDirection(int) - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.DotCom
sets the direction value for the current DotCom instance
setDotComId(String) - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.DotCom
Sets the ID for the current DotCom object
setGuess(String) - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.Player
stores the guess made by the player to the current Player instance
setName(String) - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.DotCom

setName(String) - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.Player
sets a name to the current Player instance
setSelected() - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.DotCom
Sets the selection flag to true
setUserName(String) - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.DotCom
sets the name of the player who has selected the current DotCom instance
showScores() - Method in class com.lxisoft.battle.game.app.GameEngine
Used to display the final scores of all players and display a leader board

The method is called once the game has ended.
